artifacts.name: Ishtar Gate
artifacts.description: Monumental gate with glazed brick decoration featuring 8-pointed star rosettes
artifacts.educational_value: Shows advanced geometry in architecture and religious symbolism

artifacts.name: Code of Hammurabi Stele
artifacts.description: Black basalt stele with law code and relief of Shamash granting laws
artifacts.educational_value: Demonstrates divine geometry and cosmic order in law

artifacts.description: Fragmentary stele showing king making offerings to gods

artifacts.educational_value: Demonstrates geometric composition and narrative structure

artifacts.description: Seal showing heroes fighting animals with geometric borders

artifacts.name: Warka Vase

artifacts.name: Great Ziggurat of Ur
